title: Welcome to fXtooR Blog
excerpt: Yeh hamare blog ka pehla article hai.
content:
Yeh blog ka poora content hai. Yahan aap details likh sakte hain.

### Markdown Features

Aap apne content mein **bold text**, *italic text*, aur `inline code` use kar sakte hain.

Aap lists bhi bana sakte hain:

- Pehla item
- Dusra item
- Teesra item

Aur links bhi add kar sakte hain, jaise Google.

title: Second Blog Post
excerpt: Dusra article jisme naye updates milenge.
content: Yeh dusre post ka content hai.
